definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]

sentences.english: During the teaching force of the subtleties will be passed to students, respected by the disciples.
sentences.chinese: 教學期間將武之奧妙之處傳給師生，受到弟子尊敬。

sentences.english: They're a very beautiful animal. Everything about them is just interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他們的外表十分美麗，有關狼獾的一切都奧妙無窮。

sentences.english: I knew exactly what was happening and wanted to tip her 10%.
sentences.chinese: 我對箇中奧妙知道得清清楚楚，想給她10%的小費。

sentences.english: Discover the mystery and fun of science.
sentences.chinese: 透過外師的引導，印證科學的奧妙與樂趣。

sentences.english: "The art and science of anesthesiology is choosing the right dose," he said.
sentences.chinese: “麻醉學的奧妙在於選擇合適的劑量，”他說。

sentences.english: We are now beginning to understand why.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們開始瞭解箇中奧妙了。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, this one mode is occurrent also delicate and fluctuant.
sentences.chinese: 不外，這一模式也正在發生奧妙變更。

sentences.english: It seems to me a most marvelous book.
sentences.chinese: 這本書我覺得奧妙之至。

sentences.english: My uncle hasn't slept for many days but he isn't tired at all. What's his secret?
sentences.chinese: 我叔叔很多天沒有睡覺，卻一點也不累，奧妙安在？

sentences.english: I have found the paradox that if I love until it hurts, than there is no hurt, but only more love.
sentences.chinese: 我發現世事的奧妙，愛到痛時亦不痛，唯有更多的愛。

sentences.english: But there was one group of people who could make sense of it.
sentences.chinese: 但是有一羣人可能深得其中奧妙。

sentences.english: The heart, that obscure, celestial flower, undergoes a mysterious blossoming.
sentences.chinese: 這顆心，這朵奧妙的仙花，那麼神祕地開放了。

sentences.english: I really don't know clouds at all.
sentences.chinese: 是雲的幻影啊，我真不懂雲的奧妙呵。

sentences.english: Its mystery lies in the ingenious center of gravity distributed and the suitable spread of axis and the gauge .
sentences.chinese: 它的奧妙在於巧妙的重心分佈及適當的軸距和輪距。

sentences.english: "The art and science of anesthesiology is choosing the right dose, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說“麻醉學的奧妙在於選擇合適的劑量”。

sentences.english: It's not difficult to see what's behind it.

definition: to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
body odor/to appreciate a subtle taste
want to stop but can't (idiom)/to be unable to stop oneself/to feel an urge to continue
to hold in store/to contain (untapped reserves etc)
